mapper.select: select u.*, o.id as o_id,o.user_id as o_user_id, o.order_number as o_order_number, o.created as o_created ,o.updated as o_updated, od.id as od_id ,od.order_id as order_id, od.total_price as total_price , od.status as status from tb_order o left join tb_user u on o.user_id=u.id left join tb_orderdetail od on o.id=od.order_id where o.order_number = #{number}
